fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: This tab / field in the template is only populated if there are no hospitality expenses for the reporting period. This field should be populated with the year of the reporting period.

fields.name: month
fields.title: Month
fields.description: This tab / field in the template is only populated if there are no hospitality expenses for the reporting period. This field should be populated with the month of the reporting period.
